name: AI Revolution Hackathon
description: Join us for an exciting virtual hackathon focused on AI innovations. Collaborate with developers worldwide and build groundbreaking AI solutions.
about: This virtual hackathon aims to bring together AI/ML enthusiasts, talented developers, designers, and entrepreneurs to solve real-world business challenges from APAC using Azure AI. With multiple partner challenges, our goal is for participants to use Azure technology to create something innovative and transformative. The hackathon will be broken up into two phases. Phase 1 will consist of solution design and architecture. Phase 2 will consist of taking your idea and creating a prototype.

resources.title: Get started with Azure AI
resources.description: Module guiding you through the steps of creating and deploying an agent.
